div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 330 Axus, Crete, 1961 Burial: early 1st cent. B.C. Contents: 54+ AR, 44+ AE Histiaea: 1 tetrob. Corinth: 1 triob. Sicyon: 2 triob. Achaean League: 43 triob. Axus: 38 AE Chersonesus: AE Eleutherna: 1 AE Gortyna: 2 AE Lyttus: AE Phaestus: AE Polyrhenium: AE Rhodes: 7 dr. Disposition: Athens 8 Varoucha, Pepragmena tou B' Diethnous Kreto- logikou Synedriou, 2 (Athens, 1968), pp. 214-5 This hd. may originally have contained 140 pieces
